uniol.apt.analysis.bounded

Class Bounded

  • java.lang.Object
    • uniol.apt.analysis.bounded.Bounded

  • public class Bounded
extends java.lang.Object
    Tests if a net is (k-)bounded. A net is bounded if no place can get an unlimited number of tokens. A net is k-bounded if no place can get more than k token.
    Author:
    Uli Schlachter, vsp

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static BoundedResult checkBounded(PetriNet pn)
      Check if the Petri net is (k-)bounded
      static boolean isBounded(PetriNet pn)
      Returns true if all places in the Petri net are bounded.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • isBounded

        public static boolean isBounded(PetriNet pn)
        Returns true if all places in the Petri net are bounded.

        public static BoundedResult checkBounded(PetriNet pn)
        Check if the Petri net is (k-)bounded
        Parameters:

        Returns:
